lines:
1956.

Luk.

chrecksent

28 Mellen 85

Cambridge, Maso.

July 6. 1911. 
Dear Mr. Stearns, e

I am planning 
to attend the Annual

Chinese Students Conference 
to be held at Princeton 
University on the 22nd of 
August. It is my intention. 
to leave Cambridge for 
Men Jersey on the 18th of this 
month. I am in need of 
Money for this trip. 2 wieh. 
you will kindly send me 
fifty dollars (880) to defrach 
the expenses incured. D. 
shall be much obliged if you 
well Allon me this sum 
Money at your carlient Conven -
ence. your very and

s. b. Luk
raw: 1956. Luk. chrecksent 28 Mellen 85 Cambridge, Maso. July 6. 1911. Dear Mr. Stearns, e I am planning to attend the Annual Chinese Students Conference to be held at Princeton University on the 22nd of August. It is my intention. to leave Cambridge for Men Jersey on the 18th of this month. I am in need of Money for this trip. 2 wieh. you will kindly send me fifty dollars (880) to defrach the expenses incured. D. shall be much obliged if you well Allon me this sum Money at your carlient Convenence. your very and s. b. Luk

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter stating that he would be attending the annual Chinese Students' Association conference at Princeton on August 22. He requests $50 for this trip.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
